lead_paragraph: Representatives of the Shabab militant group and of the Kenyan Defense Ministry each claimed that they had inflicted heavy losses on the other side.
snippet: Representatives of the Shabab militant group and of the Kenyan Defense Ministry each claimed that they had inflicted heavy losses on the other side....

headline.main: Shabab Militants Attack Kenyan Military Base in Somalia
headline.print_headline: Shabab Militants Attack Kenyans in Somalia
